item.title: 英伟达重返中国市场，此举为何充满风险
item.description: 英伟达公司创始人黄仁勋历经数月游说，终于如愿以偿——美国政府批准该公司向中国出售其主力人工智能芯片。【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s Jensen Huang finally got what he spent months lobbying for when the US government authorized the company to sell its workhorse artificial intelligence chip to China.】

item.title: 魁北克企业竭力留住外籍员工 应对严打行动
item.description: 从工厂车间到市政厅，越来越多的声音发出警告：在法语区魁北克省终止一项移民计划，可能导致众多工人离开加拿大，使雇主们陷入招聘困境。【原文：From factory floors to city halls, a growing chorus is warning that the end of an immigration program in French-speaking Quebec may push many workers out of the country and leave employers struggling to fill jobs.】

item.title: 美联储杰斐逊称生产率增长有助于抑制通胀
item.description: 美联储副主席菲利普·杰斐逊表示，他对美国经济前景持"谨慎乐观"态度，并指出强劲的生产率增长有望助力通胀回归央行设定的2%目标。【原文：Federal Reserve Vice Chair Philip Jefferson said he was “cautiously optimistic” about the outlook for the US economy, suggesting strong productivity growth could help return inflation to the central bank’s 2% target.】

item.title: 坎托收购案将缩减奥康纳在亚洲和欧洲的业务版图
item.description: 据知情人士透露，在从瑞银集团收购对冲基金后，坎托菲茨杰拉德公司正大幅削减奥康纳在美国以外地区的业务。【原文：Cantor Fitzgerald LP is shedding much of O’Connor’s presence outside of the US following its acquisition of the hedge fund from UBS Group AG, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 芝加哥期权交易所将推出二元事件投注，推动预测市场发展
item.description: 交易所运营商芝商所全球市场公司计划推出期权合约，允许对事件结果进行二元押注，以此进军快速增长的预测市场。【原文：Exchange operator Cboe Global Markets Inc. plans to roll out options contracts that will enable binary bets on event outcomes, in a bid to enter the fast-growing prediction markets.】

item.title: 据称北欧资本正考虑以20亿欧元出售Conscia公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，北欧资本正考虑出售丹麦网络安全公司Conscia，并寻求超过20亿欧元（约合24亿美元）的估值。【原文：Nordic Capital is considering a sale of Danish cybersecurity firm Conscia and seeking a valuation of more than €2 billion ($2.4 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: PJM预测未来十年电力供应将出现重大短缺，数据中心热潮持续升温
item.description: 美国最大电网运营商PJM互联公司警告称，随着数据中心加速需求增长，未来十年电力供应缺口可能高达60吉瓦。【原文：PJM Interconnection LLC, operator of the largest US grid, warned of a potential power supply shortfall of as much as 60 gigawatts over the next decade as data centers accelerate demand growth.】

item.title: 体育应用Sleeper将与Kalshi合作推出预测市场
item.description: 曾起诉美国衍生品监管机构的幻想体育应用将与Kalshi公司合作，在其平台上提供投注服务，成为蓬勃发展的预测市场行业最新入局者。【原文：A fantasy sports app that once sued the US derivatives regulator will partner with Kalshi Inc. to offer wagers on its platform, the latest entrant into the surging prediction markets industry.】

item.title: 对冲基金遭遇数月来最惨重单日跌幅，人工智能驱动的轮动效应加剧市场震荡
item.description: 本周因担忧人工智能影响而引发的股市动荡，已动摇了众多对冲基金策略——这些策略在2026年伊始曾表现强劲。【原文：The turmoil unleashed in stocks this week by worries about the impact of artificial intelligence has rattled a slew of hedge fund strategies that had been enjoying a strong start to 2026.】

item.title: Waymo称Genie 3模拟技术可助力自动驾驶出租车推广
item.description: Alphabet旗下Waymo公司表示，正利用DeepMind的Genie 3人工智能模型构建逼真的数字世界，为其自动驾驶技术提供边缘案例场景训练环境。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Waymo said it is using DeepMind’s Genie 3 AI model to create realistic, digital worlds for its autonomous driving technology to train on edge-case scenarios.】

item.title: 全球糖业供过于求，且过剩局面将持续
item.description: 全球供应过剩令糖市承压，而最大产糖国巴西即将迎来大丰收，这意味着该问题很可能持续存在。【原文：The sugar market is weighed down by a global glut, and a big crop coming from top grower Brazil means the problem is likely to persist.】

item.title: Compass公司未能成功申请临时禁令阻止Zillow挂牌规则
item.description: Compass公司未能成功申请临时禁令，阻止Zillow集团禁止在其他平台先行发布房源的行为。此前法官在该房产搜索网站与美国最大房地产经纪公司的法律纠纷中作出了有利于Zillow的裁决。【原文：Compass Inc. lost a bid to temporarily block a Zillow Group Inc. ban on listings that have been advertised elsewhere first, after a judge ruled in favor of the home-search site in its legal battle with the largest US real estate brokerage.】

item.title: 博通因限制VMware许可面临欧盟日益严密的审查
item.description: 博通公司因涉嫌对VMware软件实施许可限制，面临欧盟深入反垄断调查的风险加剧，监管机构正对滥用市场支配地位的新证据展开更深入的审查。【原文：Broadcom Inc. faces an increased threat of an in-depth European Union antitrust probe over alleged licensing restrictions on VMware Inc. software, with regulators taking a closer look at fresh evidence of abuse of dominance.】

item.title: 市场如何演变为一场巨型动量交易
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读本期通讯，这里汇集了Odd Lots世界每日精选内容。有时是我们——乔·韦森塔尔和特蕾西·阿洛威——为您解读市场、金融与经济领域的最新动态；有时则是来自我们专家嘉宾及信息源网络的深度贡献。无论内容形式如何，我们承诺始终为您带来精彩内容。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 制裁令卢克石油关联的谷物贸易商尚未起步便已沉没
item.description: 据知情人士透露，俄罗斯石油巨头卢克石油公司去年曾试图从迪拜意外进军谷物贸易领域，但该计划很快因美国对这家俄罗斯石油巨头的制裁而告吹。【原文：Lukoil PJSC attempted a surprise push into grains trading from Dubai last year, before the plan was quickly scuppered by US sanctions on the Russian oil giant, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 涉嫌参与2012年利比亚班加西袭击事件的男子已被美国拘押
item.description: 美国联邦调查局局长卡什·帕特尔和司法部长帕姆·邦迪周五表示，一名涉嫌参与2012年利比亚班加西美国大使馆致命袭击事件的嫌疑人已被美国拘押。【原文：A man suspected of being responsible for the deadly 2012 attack against the American embassy in Benghazi, Libya, is in US custody, FBI Director Kash Patel and Attorney General Pam Bondi said Friday.】

item.title: 据称汽车救援服务公司RAC将为伦敦IPO新增多家银行承销商
item.description: 据知情人士透露，汽车服务供应商RAC已增聘顾问团队，协助筹备其在伦敦的潜在首次公开募股事宜。【原文：Driving services provider RAC has appointed more advisers to help arrange its potential initial public offering in London, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国消费者信心指数意外升至六个月高点
item.description: 美国消费者信心意外回升至六个月高点，主要得益于股市上涨带来的财富效应，使富裕阶层受益。【原文：US consumer sentiment unexpectedly improved to the highest in six months, largely propelled by wealthier Americans who have benefited from stock-market gains.】

item.title: 美国天然气价格小幅上涨，因寒潮持续且液化天然气出口增加
item.description: 美国天然气期货价格上涨，因液化天然气终端接收了更多国内天然气供应，且天气预报显示气温将较此前预期略有下降。【原文：US natural gas futures rose as liquefied natural gas terminals took in higher volumes of domestic gas supply, and weather forecasts shifted to show slightly colder weather than previously expected.】

item.title: 标普500指数与纳斯达克100指数上涨，人工智能驱动的科技股暴跌势头趋缓
item.description: 周五美国股市开始反弹，逢低买盘趁势而为，科技股因人工智能概念引发的暴跌成为其获利良机。【原文：US stocks started to rebound on Friday as dip buyers capitalized on the artificial intelligence-fueled plunge in technology stocks.】

item.title: 美联储的博斯蒂克称将通胀率降至2%目标"至关重要"
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔·博斯蒂克重申，将利率维持在能够抑制经济活动并使通胀率回归2%的水平至关重要。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic reiterated that it’s important to keep interest rates at a level that restricts economic activity and returns inflation to 2%.】

item.title: 瑞银两名看涨分析师转为看跌，成为2017年以来最悲观的预测
item.description: 瑞银集团周五遭两名分析师下调评级，其股价正面临近10个月来最糟糕的一周表现。此前该行美国财富管理业务资金外流，令其财报表现黯然失色。【原文：UBS Group AG was downgraded by a pair of analysts on Friday as shares head for their worst week in nearly 10 months, after outflows at the bank’s US wealth business took the shine off earnings.】

item.title: 欧洲央行呼吁欧盟领导人采取紧急行动以释放经济增长潜力
item.description: 欧洲央行敦促欧盟领导人采取"紧急集体行动"以提振经济，并为即将召开的峰会提出了五项关键措施供其考虑。【原文：The European Central Bank told EU leaders to take “urgent collective action” to strengthen the economy, outlining five key measures to consider ahead of an upcoming summit.】

item.title: 印度国家证券交易所获董事会批准后启动IPO流程
item.description: 印度国家证券交易所有限公司已启动首次公开募股的筹备工作。该公司周五提交的监管文件显示，其董事会已批准该提案，并成立委员会负责监督整个流程。【原文：National Stock Exchange of India Ltd. has started preparations for an initial public offering after its board approved the proposal and formed a committee to oversee the process, according to a regulatory filing on Friday.】

item.title: 英格兰银行行长淡化降息速度，警告全球可能面临新冲击
item.description: 英格兰银行首席经济学家休·皮尔表示，政策制定者正朝着"平稳有效"的方式将英国通胀率降至2%目标值的目标稳步推进，当前地缘政治因素对经济构成的威胁远大于进一步降息的步伐。【原文：Bank of England Chief Economist Huw Pill said policymakers are on track to bring UK inflation back to the 2% target “in a smooth and effective way,” with geopolitics posing a bigger threat to the economy than the pace of further rate cuts.】

item.title: Proto Labs首席执行官表示，此次扩张将推动公司实现2021年以来最快的增长。
item.description: Proto Labs公司扩大生产计划将推动其营收增速达到五年来的最高水平。【原文：Proto Labs Inc.’s production expansion plans are set to lift revenue growth to its fastest pace in five years.】

item.title: TPG以35亿美元收购电力基础设施公司Sabre
item.description: TPG公司已达成协议，将收购Sabre Industries的多数股权。该公司是为电力公用事业、电信和数据中心提供关键基础设施的最大供应商之一。【原文：TPG Inc. has struck a deal to acquire a majority stake in Sabre Industries, one of the largest providers of critical infrastructure for power utilities, telecoms and data centers.】

item.title: 加拿大就业人数减少24,800人，失业率降至6.5%
item.description: 加拿大经济上月减少了24,800个就业岗位，制造业遭受最大冲击，因美国关税持续对该行业造成冲击。【原文：The Canadian economy shed 24,800 jobs last month, with the largest employment losses in manufacturing as US tariffs continue to take a bite out of the sector.】

item.title: 中国禁止境外未经批准发行人民币挂钩稳定币
item.description: 中国已收紧对加密货币及代币化实物资产的管控，禁止国内实体未经批准在境外发行数字代币，并叫停离岸发行与人民币挂钩的稳定币。【原文：China has tightened curbs on cryptocurrencies and tokenized real-world assets, barring domestic entities from issuing digital tokens overseas without approval and banning the offshore issuance of yuan-linked stablecoins.】

item.title: 诺沃的惊人崛起已演变为4600亿美元的崩盘
item.description: 就在上个月，诺和诺德A/S的股价似乎正迎来转机。分析师对这家丹麦制药巨头重磅产品Wegovy减肥针剂的口服版本持乐观态度，而投资者似乎已将这家昔日市场宠儿的销售前景疲软因素计入股价。【原文：Just last month, Novo Nordisk A/S shares seemed to be turning a corner. Analysts were optimistic about the pill version of the Danish drugmaker’s blockbuster Wegovy obesity shot, while investors seemed to have priced in any weakness in the former market darling’s sales outlook.】
